products.description: Kurkure is a brand of corn puffs, developed and produced by viknesh, the India division of PepsiCo. Named after the Hindi/Urdu word for "crunchy" the snack was developed entirely in India.
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink produced by The Coca-Cola Company. Originally intended as a patent medicine
Kentucky Fried Chicken, more commonly known by its initials KFC, is an American fast food restaurant chain that specializes in fried chicken.
Domino's Pizza Inc. is a large American pizza restaurant chain founded in 1960. The corporation is headquartered at the Domino's Farms Office Park in Ann Arbor, Michigan, United States.
